verses.verse: In the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H8147>month,<s%> on the twelfth day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against him and against all <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H6547>"Behold,<s%> I am against you, Pharaoh <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8577>monster<s%> that <S%H7257>lies<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of his <S%H2975>rivers,<s%> that has <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2975><s%> 'My river is my <S%H6213>own,<s%> and I have made it for myself.'

I will <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2397>hooks<s%> in your <S%H3895>jaws,<s%> and I will make the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of your <S%H2975>rivers<s%> <S%H1692>stick<s%> to your <S%H7193>scales;<s%> and I will bring you <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of your <S%H2975>rivers,<s%> with all the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of your <S%H2975>rivers<s%> which <S%H1692>stick<s%> to your <S%H7193>scales.<s%>

<S%H5203>I<s%>'ll cast you forth into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> you and all the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of your <S%H2975>rivers.<s%> <S%H5307>You<s%>'ll fall on the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field.<s%> You <S%H622>won't<s%> be brought together, nor <S%H6908>gathered.<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you for <S%H402>food<s%> to the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> and to the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky.<s%>

All the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> because they have been a <S%H4938>staff<s%> of <S%H7070>reed<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

When they took <S%H8610>hold<s%> of you by your <S%H3709>hand,<s%> you <S%H7533>broke,<s%> and <S%H1234>tore<s%> all their <S%H3802>shoulders;<s%> and when they <S%H8172>leaned<s%> on <S%H7665>you,<s%> you broke, and <S%H5976>paralyzed<s%> all of their <S%H4975>thighs.<s%>"

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H935>"Behold,<s%> I will bring a <S%H2719>sword<s%> on <S%H3772>you,<s%> and will cut off <S%H120>man<s%> and animal from <S%H929>you.<s%>

The <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall be a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> and a <S%H2723>waste;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Because he has <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2975><s%> 'The river is <S%H6213>mine,<s%> and I have made it;'

<S%H2975>therefore,<s%> behold, I am against you, and against your rivers, and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> an <S%H2721>utter<s%> <S%H2723>waste<s%> and <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> from the <S%H4024>tower<s%> of <S%H5482>Seveneh<s%> even to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia.<s%>

No <S%H7272>foot<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H7272>it,<s%> nor foot of <S%H929>animal<s%> shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H3427>it,<s%> neither shall it be inhabited <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>countries<s%> that are <S%H8074>desolate;<s%> and her <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are laid <S%H2717>waste<s%> shall be a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> and I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and will <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them through the <S%H776>countries.<s%>"

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> "At the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> where they were <S%H6327>scattered;<s%>

and I will bring <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and will cause them to <S%H7725>return<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H6624>Pathros,<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H4351>birth;<s%> and they shall be there a <S%H8217>base<s%> <S%H4467>kingdom.<s%>

It shall be the <S%H8217>base<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms;<s%> neither shall it any more lift itself up <S%H5375>above<s%> the <S%H1471>nations:<s%> and I will <S%H4591>diminish<s%> <S%H7287>them,<s%> that they shall no more rule over the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

It shall be no more the <S%H4009>confidence<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2142>bringing<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to <S%H2142>memory,<s%> when they turn to <S%H6437>look<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3045>them:<s%> and they shall know that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>"'"

It came to pass in the <S%H7651>seven<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H259>month,<s%> in the first day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5647>caused<s%> his <S%H2428>army<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5656>service<s%> against <S%H6865>Tyre:<s%> every <S%H7218>head<s%> was made <S%H7139>bald,<s%> and every <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> was <S%H4803>worn;<s%> yet had he no <S%H7939>wages,<s%> nor his <S%H2428>army,<s%> from <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> that he had served against <S%H5647>it.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I will give the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> and he shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> off her <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> and <S%H5375>take<s%> her <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> and <S%H7997>take<s%> her <S%H957>prey;<s%> and it shall be the <S%H7939>wages<s%> for his <S%H2428>army.<s%>

I have <S%H5414>given<s%> him the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> as his <S%H6468>recompense<s%> for which he <S%H5647>served,<s%> because they <S%H6213>worked<s%> for <S%H5002>me,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H6779>cause<s%> a <S%H7161>horn<s%> to bud <S%H6779>forth<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H6610>opening<s%> of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in their <S%H8432>midst;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
